stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn ends, place 1 power counter on this hardware if you are tagged. Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] When your turn ends, place 1 power counter on this hardware if you are tagged. Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Amanuensis
